name: Send Email on SingleCell LIB QC PASS
script:
if doc.qc_status == "PASS" and doc.customer: customer = frappe.get_doc("NGS Customer", doc.customer) sample_link = "" if doc.sample_info: sample_link = frappe.utils.get_url_to_form("NGS Sample Info", doc.sample_info) if customer.email: subject = f"Your Library QC Status: PASS — {doc.singlecell_library_construction_id or doc.name}" message = f"""

QC Status: PASS

Dear {customer.customer_name},

We are pleased to inform you that your library construction {doc.singlecell_library_construction_id or doc.name} has successfully passed the quality control (QC) process.

You can view the details of your sample information here:
View Sample Info ({doc.sample_info})

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us.

Best regards,
Your Athenomics Lab Team

""" frappe.sendmail( recipients=[customer.email], subject=subject, message=message )
